name: Crocodile Simulator Attack 3D
description:
Try Crocodile Simulator Attack 3D - Survival Game 2016!
Have you ever wanted to see the world through the eyes of a Crocodile? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling…!
Crocodile Simulator Attack 3D - Survival Game 2016 is full of anger and blaze of the angry swamp crocodile. Use your animal instinct and attack wild animals with vicious power and rage. Take control of most wild predators reptile swamp monster, all animals in forest are scared from the bloodthirsty hungry eyes, sharp teeth, deadly roar of the wildlife simulator alligator rampage. Download this crocodile simulator 2016 and attack on wild animals. Be a part of epic battle between survival of the fittest in animal simulators. Survive against wildlife reptiles in this ultimate crocodile simulator.
In Crocodile Attack 3D you play as a huge crocodile predator and learn the fun of devouring your prey. With an appetite as big as the size of this water beast, you can hunt and eat anything. See the world as an angry monster that will attack anything it sets its bulging eyes on. Control this giant in water and on land.
You had played goat, snake, lion, horse, humpback whales, wolf simulator now try your hands on controlling angry wildlife crocodile simulator 3d. Swim in the swamp or crawl through dark water or lush greenery environment with peoples. Crocodile are deadliest hunters they eats people hunts down them in this realistic simulator.
Features of Crocodile Simulator Attack 3D - Survival Game 2016
• Time Mode
• Inspiring Environment
• Amazing Graphics (GUI)
• Appealing Sound Effects
• Huge animated 3D crocodile.
• Smooth and easy controls to make the crocodile move and attack.
• Fast and action packed gameplay.
• 10 awesome levels.
